title: Coming home
creator_credit: Louise Blake, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Despite being born in Canberra, Louise Blake’s family history has very strong ties to Melbourne. Over the years, family trips have drawn Blake ‘south of the border’, where suburbs like Port Melbourne and Brunswick evoke stories from her family history.
creator_credit_for_label: Louise Blake, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
